panel.field: Sisters Editor. Spawn position values are in 8192ths of a tile.
Necessary to edit the parameters to the right without the game crashing. Values for affected parameters will also look wrong until applied and modified. Doesn't affect anything else.

panel.title: Sister Initial Closing Speed (Per Frame)
panel.field: Increase this for higher spawn distances to make the Sisters move in faster. Requires the above patch to not break the game. Default value 1, Max 255.

panel.title: Sister Horizontal Rotation Distance
panel.field: Also requires the patch to work properly. Max 127 with this setup but that's almost to the edge of the screen anyway. The base value is 112.
